courses.name: Dutch course at ROC Amsterdam A2-B1
Interior Design at Art University College Bournemouth

profile_positions.description:
• In charge of credit control for all EU and worldwide markets, reporting directly to the CFO
• Manage the debtor’s AR ageing, ensure the invoices are paid in accordance with the agreed payment terms
• Monitor and follow up with our customers regarding overdue invoices, resolve payment differences, discuss and negotiate payment plan to pay off the debt
• Identify and action significant collection risk issues and minimize overall Day Sales Outstanding (DSO)
• Preparing Monthly reports such as: AR Ageing report, Provision Bad Debt to monitor the trend of the customer’s portfolio and to inform the management
• Preparing monthly statements for our key B2B accounts, provide reports for agent’s commissions
• Importing bank statements and allocating payments to the respective invoices
•Owner of B2C process, monthly reconciliations, ensuring all B2C orders are billed
• Manage customer set-up, ensure customer data is accurate and up to date
• Deciding about customer’s payment terms for newly created customers
• Owner of SEPA direct debit payment method
• Credit check and block customers ‘accounts due to any payment issues such as overdue invoices, direct debit payment rejections
• Close collaboration with Sales Support in terms of approving orders release 
• Established good line of communication with external agents and customers
• Improving internal communication between Sales Support
department and Finance (Credit Controller) by organize monthly catch up sessions, presenting current processes and incorporate new ones
• Suggesting proposals of improvement current credit control processes to IT Department
profile_positions.title: Credit Controller

profile_positions.description:
• Owner of cash allocation and application process
• Daily Cash Management activities
• Weekly reporting of unallocated cash to wider audience 
• Monitor aging and credit collection activities 
• Manage Accounts Receivable Worldwide regions
• Owner of Invoicing Process for Consumer Product Group and Digital 
• Maintaining customer Master Data
• Assistance with month-end closing procedures
• Train personnel on job functions (intern, for back up)
profile_positions.title: Accounts Receivable Associate

profile_positions.description:
Manage Accounts Receivable for CEEMEA and Worldwide regions:

• Cash allocation and application process
• Accounts reconciliations
• Managing and processing customer claims 
• Monitor Aging and collection

Vendor Maintenance Role:

• First point of contact regarding any vendor queries
• Process new incoming Vendor set up forms submitted by the business
• Improvements on the current VM process
• Assistance on implementation of a new vendor portal
• Clean-up of Vendor Database
profile_positions.title: Transactional Services Accounting Associate

profile_positions.description:
• Maintaining the billing system 
• Creating and sending manual invoices, making weekly invoices for vouchers and leisure products
• Solving issues via emails with partners (mainly polish, dutch, nordic) regarding
payments
•  journalizing sales and purchase invoices into the general ledger (booking in Basecone)
•  Preparing weekly a payment batch in the accounting system Exact Online (for all Accor partners)
• Managing the whole process of refund payments, making manual bank transfers directly in the bank, checking for missing or late refunds in the online payment platforms such as Adyen, Payvision and Credorax 
•  Liaising with Central Sourcing and communicating all needed information, solving problems and follow up on the status of payments and issues
• Flagging and informing when discrepancies are found in the partner details in our systems
• Taking part in various projects in order to continue the improvement of the process in the billing
• registering any losses in the losses sheet
profile_positions.title: Finance Administrator

profile_positions.description:
• Administrative support for Polish Account Manager
• Direct contact with polish partners via emails and over the phone
• Solving issues with partners regarding reservations, overbookings and
other related matters
• Responsible for booking excursions in Warsaw and Krakow for our
guests
• Very good knowledge of TravelBird CMS system, partner extranet
system and Highrise
• Being the only contact person responsible for the customers using the
polish TravelBird website after closure of the site
• Responsible for dealing with emails with various enquiries and
occasionally complains
• Creating refund request in the CMS system
• Sending tourist/transfer information to the guest for special request,
helping people with their boarding passes
profile_positions.title: Sales & Polish Customer Service internship at TravelBird

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for checking in and checking out
• Making hotel reservations and upselling
• Dealing with customers enquiries and occasional complaints
• Emailing, faxing, banking, invoicing
• Conducting show- rounds and providing potential clients with 
comprehensive quotations and information regarding hotel facilitates and
services
• Together with my colleague from marketing department I participated in the Wedding Show at the BIC Bournemouth representing the hotel
• Took part in a promo video/photo shoot for the hotel
profile_positions.title: Receptionist

profile_positions.description:
• Answering phone calls
• Operating Opera system
• Providing great customers service
• Meeting and greeting guests
• Providing general information about attractions available in town to the
guests
profile_positions.title: Reception Trainee

profile_positions.description:
• Documents archiving, data storing in electronic form
• Drafting various letters
• Call handing
• Providing information to visitors
• Assisting on development projects for the town sponsored by the EU
profile_positions.title: Office Assistant

volunteer_experiences.description:
• Completion of sales and logistics of products
• Responsible for providing information to clients
• Help with creating advertising products
• Assist with other sales and marketing personnel to determine the best methods   of promoting products
